name: Riology IT Solutions
tagline: Because your Image Demands a Professional Website.
description: Locally owned and operated, Riology is commited to providing professional, yet affordable Website Development Solutions for businesses of all sizes. Riology's Prime objective is to provide our clients with a professional and powerful presence on the World Wide Web. To that end, we offer professional face-to-face Web Consulting, Web site Design, Web Hosting, E-mail Hosting, Search Engine Optimization(S.E.O.) services, along with professional photography services.
